Metric Intelligence Anomaly Insights

selectedQueryCategory.description: Get timeseries data based on a time trend
selectedQueryCategory.label: Trend Data

selectedQueryCategory.description: Parse values out of Alert Anomalies table
selectedQueryCategory.label: Anomaly

options.content: Focus on the auto-generated anomalie scores that have severity of Major and Critical. Also cpu metrics are not considered good candidates for anomalie generation.
